mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Vanhelt, Adrien
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Vanhelt, Adrien Patient Age: 27. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound of right thoracic parietus recieved in action near Lynchburg 1864/01/18 convalescent from US Genl Hospital Gallipolis Ohio. Location Wounded: In action at Lynchburg, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/18. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
